description:
Osabaki was the match referee for Ash and Paul`s battle at Lake Acuity. Paul`s brother asked him to serve as the judge for the Pok√©mon Battle. Since Team Rocket ripped up the Pokemon Center`s battlefield, he agreed to referee the match on an open plain next to Lake Acuity.
Osabaki was unaware that Team Rocket was behind the `repairs` of the Pokemon Center`s battlefield and that they were his assistants for the match due to their clever disguises.
name: Osabaki
